name: checkmate
description: Checkmate is a self-hosted uptime and performance monitoring platform. It checks websites or APIs, sends alerts on downtime, and provides dashboards for visualizing availability history and performance data.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Check website and API availability continuously. Stay online

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Instant notifications when services go down. Quick response

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor response times and performance metrics. Optimize speed

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize uptime history with dashboards. Track reliability

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep monitoring data on your infrastructure. Data privacy
